title: fix(buffer): use node:buffer instead of safe-buffer

body: The only thing I would say is this is not a "chore" commit. It is a `fix` or `feat` (honestly in this case I could see it going either way) and also the "scope" section here is not really necessary. Not a big deal since we don't *really* enforce the conventional commit conventions anyway, but just figured I would drop this note with the approval in case you wanted to edit it before we merge.
